Axel stool

Comfortable Axel stool will become an irreplaceable stylish addition to your interior. Smooth lines, decorative stitching in the form of squares, the presence of armrests and chiseled metal legs - everything is thought out for maximum comfort. The manufacturer offers practical, pleasant-to-touch high-quality fabric as upholstery. Moderately soft filler perfectly holds its shape, does not accumulate dust and is well ventilated. ALASKA will make the interior of your dining area unusually bright and cozy, filling the space with warmth and comfort.
